QueryList.Query: select mod(truncate(lastupdated/1000000, 0), 100), is_ajax,count(*), truncate(avg(total_cost), 0) from sg_frm.frm_mon_act act where act.status = 1 (PRM_OPTIONAL P_LASTUPDATED) AND LASTUPDATED >= @P_LASTUPDATED (/) (PRM_OPTIONAL P_USERNAME) AND USERNAME = @P_USERNAME (/) (PRM_OPTIONAL P_SCREEN_ITEM_ID) AND SCREEN_ITEM_ID = @P_SCREEN_ITEM_ID (/) (PRM_OPTIONAL P_TNT_TYPE) AND TNT_TYPE = @P_TNT_TYPE (/) (PRM_OPTIONAL P_TNT_ID) AND TNT_ID = @P_TNT_ID (/) group by mod(truncate(lastupdated/1000000, 0), 100), is_ajax

select mod(truncate(lastupdated/1000000, 0), 100), SUBSTRING(log_status, 2, 1), count(*) from sg_frm.frm_mon_act act where act.status = 1 and log_status in ('RF', 'RE', 'AE') (PRM_OPTIONAL P_LASTUPDATED) AND LASTUPDATED >= @P_LASTUPDATED (/) (PRM_OPTIONAL P_USERNAME) AND USERNAME = @P_USERNAME (/) (PRM_OPTIONAL P_SCREEN_ITEM_ID) AND SCREEN_ITEM_ID = @P_SCREEN_ITEM_ID (/) (PRM_OPTIONAL P_TNT_TYPE) AND TNT_TYPE = @P_TNT_TYPE (/) (PRM_OPTIONAL P_TNT_ID) AND TNT_ID = @P_TNT_ID (/) group by mod(truncate(lastupdated/1000000, 0), 100), SUBSTRING(log_status, 2, 1);
select eml_id from sg_frm.frm_com_eml eml where eml.status = 1 and eml.mail_status = 'W' and eml.wait_datetime <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') limit 1

SELECT usr.guid, usr.status, usr.lastupdated, usr.usr_id, usr.username, '',usr.aut_type, usr.mail, usr.name, usr.surname, usr.display_name, usr.cell_phone, usr.verification_code, usr.img_id, doc.full_file_name, tnt.is_active, tnt.is_tenant_owner,usr.is_approved, usr.last_login_date, (select group_concat(role_id) from sg_frm.frm_tnt_aut_usr_rol where status = 1 and tnt_id = @P_TNT_ID and usr_id = usr.usr_id) as roles FROM sg_frm.frm_tnt_aut_usr_tnt tnt, sg_frm.frm_tnt_aut_usr usr left outer join sg_frm.frm_doc doc on doc.status = 1 and doc.doc_id = usr.img_id WHERE usr.status = 1 and tnt.status = 1 and tnt.usr_id = usr.usr_id and tnt.tnt_id = @P_TNT_ID (PRM_OPTIONAL P_IS_ACTIVE) AND tnt.is_active = @P_IS_ACTIVE (/) union select 0, 0, 0, 0, inv.mail, '','', inv.mail, '', '', '', '', '', 0, '', 0, 0,0, 0, '' from sg_frm.frm_tnt_aut_usr_tnt_inv inv where inv.status = 1 and is_confirmed = 0 and is_cancelled = 0 and inv.tnt_id = @P_TNT_ID
SELECT SUBJECT_ID, PARENT_ID,NODE_TYPE,SUBJECT_NAME,SUBJECT_ICON_CONTENT,PRIORITY FROM sg_frm.frm_usg_sbj where status = 1
